attributes.action: STOP THE TRANSFER OF HOSPITAL SERVICES TO THE PRIVATE SECTOR THROUGH CATS CENTRES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government are privatising hospital services by the introduction of Clinical Assessment Treat Centres (CATS), which will be funded by the NHS, therefore, diverting monies anD services from existing hospitals to the private sector.
This will cost the NHS, as the private sector will require to make a PROFIT, and by taking work and revenue from the hospitals, will further the arguments for reducing hospital services and staff.
A 5-year contract is being offered to the private CATS suppliers, which will require funding, even if they do not achieve any results.

THIS FUNDING SHOULKD REMAIN WITHIN THE NHS, AND CONTRACTS BE OFFERED TO NHS STAFF TO ENSURE THEIR SECURITY OF EMPLOYMENT, WITHOUT THE CONSTANT THREAT OF REDUNDANCIES
